Name: Adventure Game
About the game: A VR adventure game: explore dungeons, fight wicked beasts, collect treasure, and solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries of a strange island Features: -For Oculus Rift and HTC Vive (request support for others) -Hover locomotion (intended) with support for teleportation mode (except in water) -Spatialized audio -Dungeons, shops, and secret rooms spread across an island (30 acres) -Traditional fantasy monsters: oozes, reptilians, skeleton -Traditional action RPG puzzles Updated occasionally with new content and other improvements
Meta Title: Adventure Game: Jul 12, 2018, IVGEMENT and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Adventure Game? Check out the release date (Jul 12, 2018), developer insights from IVGEMENT, and a complete game summary.
